function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability of hvac system to efficiently kill microbes transmitted by droplets.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi in inactivating more-resistant bacteria and fungal spores","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mixing of room air for uvgi to effectively inactivate microorganisms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect implementation of combination of general ventilation system and uv lamps","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to uv light at 253.7 nm can cause harm to unprotected skin and eyes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi fixtures in inactivating certain types of microorganisms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of uvgi efficacy on airflow conditions in the room.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spores being resistant to uvgi can lead to ineffective removal of biological agents.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of uvgi depends strongly on the type of virus nucleic acid, leading to varying susceptibility to uv inactivation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High rh relative humidity providing protection against uv-induced dna or rna damage for viruses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system causing the spread of airborne diseases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misidentification of true airborne infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Vulnerability of infectious agents to uvgi exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in different environmental conditions such as high and low relative humidity rh","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from surfaces to hands and subsequent transmission","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in biological fluids such as mucus, feces, and blood","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-range aerosol transmission of infectious material","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dispersal of pathogens into the air over short distances","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of environmental factors on the movement and suspension of infectious droplets","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Droplet transmission of infectious agents eg. influenza virus within a 1-2 meter range through respiratory droplets and direct or indirect contact.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious agents not solely correlated with the size of the microbes in droplet nuclei or larger droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pathogen-laden droplets expelled during medical procedures may travel further and reach deeper into the respiratory tract of susceptible persons","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of infectious agents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inactivation of mycobacterium tuberculosis by uvgi systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence of new infectious diseases and pandemic strains of influenza","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly drug-resistant strains of m tuberculosis reported in several countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient evidence on the actual performance of uvgi systems in hospital rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited practical application of uvgi in health care buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gaps in existing evidence regarding design and operational factors impacting the efficacy of uvgi systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate prediction of outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection and diagnosis of infected patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient anticipation of critical cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on information from news articles to understand the use of data analytics in global emergency situations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Focus on country-specific measures may lead to omission of instances where other governments and organizations utilize big data technologies in pandemics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of covid-19 through chest x-ray or ct image analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing applications and data exchange","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risks to healthcare data and covid-19 research organizations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-system interoperability in healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data exchange due to legal issues, limited financial support, and international communication challenges","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor quality and incomplete healthcare data impacting response to pandemic","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of historical data for new virus transmission, incubation period, and immunity duration.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in utilizing big data analytics for covid-19 due to limited evidence and data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evolution of virus and development of mutant variants complicating prediction of covid-19 incidence and outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai tools for monitoring social distancing compliance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Utilization of cough sound analysis tool for identifying potential patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Deployment of covid-19 bus equipped with ai tools for screening based on x-ray analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of ai solutions in healthcare without proper validation and oversight","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data privacy and security measures in covid-19 tracking apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for over-reliance on ai and automation for public safety and crowd monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of big data analytics may lead to over-reliance on technology and neglect of human input in decision-making.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
